game.name: Let Me Play!
game.shortDescription: Welcome to "Two Strangers in an Elevator"! The play is about to begin. Except it doesn't. And nothing works. And why can't I choose anything? Try getting to the end of this overly meta play, or don't.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to "Two Strangers in an Elevator"! The play is about to begin. Except it doesn't. And nothing works. And why can't I choose anything? Try getting to the end of this overly meta play, or don't.
